title: Quick-hit watchdog stories: Where to find them
description: A guide for journalists on how to uncover local government misconduct by regularly requesting specific records and reports, including claims, settlements, expenses, credit card statements, cell phone bills, meeting pay logs, check registers, requests for proposals, contracts, health inspection reports, records request logs, salaries, building records, correspondence, campaign financial disclosures, Statements of Economic Interest, audited financial statements, annual budgets, nonprofit reports, and committee agendas and reports.
